property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.server.address
property.description: The address of the server which collects and aggregates the resource utilization infomration.

property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.handler.count
property.description: Number of server threads used by the Collector.

property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.timelimit
property.description: How long does a TaskTracker report expire? (millisecond)

property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.transmitperiod
property.description: How often does a TaskTracker report to the Collector? (millisecond)

property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.aggregateperiod
property.description: How often does the Collector aggregate the reports? (millisecond)

property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.stoptimelimit
property.description: How long do we consider a job is finished after it stops? (millisecond)

property.name: mapred.resourceutilization.mirrorperiod
property.description: How often do the CollectorCached mirror the information from Collector? (millisecond)
